headline: Wells Fargo to Present at the Goldman Sachs Financial Services Conference
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, December 02, 2025--Wells Fargo & Company (NYSE: WFC) said today that Chairman and Chief Executive Officer Charlie Scharf will present at the Goldman Sachs Financial Services Conference on Tuesday, Dec. 9, 2025 at 8:00 a.m. ET.

headline: Barclays Analyst Positive on Wells Fargo (WFC)
summary: Wells Fargo & Company (NYSE:WFC) is one of the best dividend stocks in the financial sector. On November 3, Barclays analyst Jason Goldberg reiterated a Buy recommendation on WFC, assigning a price target of $94. On November 5, in a separate update, a Reuters report disclosed that Charlie Scharf, the CEO of Wells Fargo, commented […]
